tha-ap491:4.3: Ānando nāma nāmena → ānando nāmupaṭṭhāko (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap491:13.1: Akariṁ ānantariyaṁ → akariṁnantariyañca (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); akarimanantariyañca (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap491:21.4: nirupamaṁ viggahaṁ → nirūpamaviggahaṁ (bj); nirūpamaggahaṁ (si); nirūpamaṁ viggahaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap491:27.1: dhammaruciyo thero → dhammarucitthero (bj); dhammaruci thero (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
